maintenanceSchedule.minor: Annual visual inspection for cracks, leaks, or pests.
maintenanceSchedule.major: Professional structural inspection every 5 years or after seismic events.

maintenanceSchedule.minor: Inspect shingles and flashing annually, clean debris.
maintenanceSchedule.major: Re-roofing or membrane replacement every 20–30 years.

maintenanceSchedule.minor: Clean leaves/debris twice per year.
Lubricate tracks and hinges annually.
maintenanceSchedule.major: Replace springs, rollers, and balance check every 5–7 years.

maintenanceSchedule.minor: Clean glass and lubricate tracks quarterly.
maintenanceSchedule.major: Replace seals or full units every 20–30 years.

maintenanceSchedule.minor: Lubricate hinges and locks annually.
Inspect for damage annually, repaint/reseal wood every 2–3 years.
maintenanceSchedule.major: Replace sections as needed, full replacement every 20 years.

maintenanceSchedule.minor: Pressure wash annually.
Clean and inspect for damage annually, reseal wood every 1–2 years.
maintenanceSchedule.major: Replace boards or railings as needed, full replacement every 15–20 years.

maintenanceSchedule.minor: Seal cracks and clean annually.
Inspect and clean flue annually.
Clean and inspect for damage annually.
maintenanceSchedule.major: Repaint or reseal every 5–10 years, replace damaged sections as needed.

maintenanceSchedule.minor: Clean and inspect for damage annually.
maintenanceSchedule.major: Repaint or reseal wood every 2–3 years, replace as needed.

maintenanceSchedule.minor: Clean fabric and inspect frame annually.
maintenanceSchedule.major: Replace fabric every 5 years, check hardware every 10 years.

maintenanceSchedule.minor: Clean and inspect for damage annually.
Check aerators, clean, and replace washers yearly.
Check for leaks annually, winterize in freezing climates.
Clean drains monthly, check caulking annually.
Clean showerhead, descale annually.
Clean and check caulking annually.
maintenanceSchedule.major: Resurface every 10–15 years, replace after 25–30 years.

maintenanceSchedule.minor: Check for leaks and proper flushing annually.
Check salt levels monthly, clean brine tank annually.
maintenanceSchedule.major: Replace resin bed every 10 years, unit every 15–20 years.

maintenanceSchedule.minor: Replace filters every 6–12 months.
Inspect for leaks and corrosion annually.
maintenanceSchedule.major: Replace galvanized pipes every 40–50 years, PVC/PEX as needed.

maintenanceSchedule.minor: Test pump and clean pit annually.
Inspect annually, pump tank every 3–5 years.
Inspect for leaks annually.
maintenanceSchedule.major: Replace galvanized pipes every 40–50 years, PVC/PEX as needed.

maintenanceSchedule.minor: Inspect and adjust heads seasonally, check for leaks annually.
maintenanceSchedule.major: Replace valves and controllers every 10–15 years.

maintenanceSchedule.minor: Test annually as required by local regulations.
Inspect for leaks and proper function annually.
Inspect annually for leaks and proper function.
Exercise valve annually to ensure it operates smoothly.
maintenanceSchedule.major: Replace every 20–30 years or if leaking.

maintenanceSchedule.minor: Test safety reverse monthly, lubricate annually.
Replace bulbs as needed, dust fixtures quarterly.
Replace bulbs and clean covers annually.
Clean grilles and fan blades annually.
Clean blades and motor housing annually.
maintenanceSchedule.major: Replace motor or entire unit every 15–20 years.

maintenanceSchedule.minor: Inspect for corrosion and tight connections annually.
maintenanceSchedule.major: Upgrade panel every 20–30 years or as needed for capacity.

maintenanceSchedule.minor: Test monthly, replace batteries annually.
Test monthly, replace batteries annually.
Vacuum weekly, deep clean annually.
Sweep/vacuum weekly, refinish every 3–5 years.
Clean and reseal stone annually.
Tighten hinges, adjust doors annually.
Clean grout and tiles quarterly, reseal grout annually.
maintenanceSchedule.major: Replace tiles as needed, full replacement every 20–30 years.

maintenanceSchedule.minor: Touch up paint and clean walls annually.
Clean and inspect for damage annually.
Clean and touch up paint annually.
Clean coils annually, replace water filter as needed.
Clean filter and drum monthly.
maintenanceSchedule.major: Replace hoses every 5 years, replace machine after 10–12 years.

maintenanceSchedule.minor: Clean lint trap after each load, vent annually.
Clean filters monthly, replace bags as needed.
Replace filters every 6–12 months.
Clean tank weekly, replace filters annually.
Flush tank annually, inspect anode rod.
Clean filter and spray arms monthly.
Clean oven and stovetop monthly.
Clean interior and exterior monthly.
Clean crumb tray monthly.
Dust screen and vents monthly.
Check for leaks and alignment each spring.
Sharpen blades annually, change oil seasonally.
Replace string/line regularly, clean filters annually.
Clean air filter and check spark plug annually.
Clean grates and check propane levels after each use.
Clean and cover furniture seasonally.
maintenanceSchedule.major: Replace cushions every 3–5 years, furniture every 10–15 years.

maintenanceSchedule.minor: Clean and sharpen tools after each use.
maintenanceSchedule.major: Replace tools as needed, typically every 10 years.

maintenanceSchedule.minor: Turn compost weekly, monitor moisture levels.
Clean and inspect annually.
Clean ash and inspect for damage annually.
Check chemical levels weekly, clean filters monthly.

maintenanceSchedule.major: Service pump and heater annually, replace every 10–15 years.

maintenanceSchedule.major: Repaint or reseal every 5–10 years, replace as needed.

maintenanceSchedule.minor: Clean fabric and inspect frame annually.
maintenanceSchedule.major: Replace fabric every 5 years, check hardware every 10 years.

Replace bulbs and clean fixtures annually.
